definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: I enjoy cuddling with my love one and interment moments.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡擁抱我的愛一個人和安葬的時刻。

sentences.english: His ashes lie in the same Roman cemetery where Keats is buried.
sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰安放在羅馬公墓，濟慈也安葬於此。

sentences.english: Shi Han is inters the Buddha Buddhist relics the most outer layer sarcophagus.
sentences.chinese: 石函是安葬佛陀舍利的最外層石棺。

sentences.english: Finally, the deceased emperor was buried in the imperial mausoleum on a selected day.
sentences.chinese: 最後，皇帝會在一個黃道吉日安葬在皇陵。

sentences.english: His body was buried in his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 他的遺體被安葬在他的故鄉。

sentences.english: Friends carried his body from the mountain. They buried him near the house where he was born.
sentences.chinese: 朋友們把他擡出大山，將他安葬在他出生的屋子旁邊。

sentences.english: We buried the flesh as it if was my son.
sentences.chinese: 我們安葬了那具屍體，就當作是我們的兒子。

sentences.english: In a quiet funeral, Shmi was buried at the Lars homestead.
sentences.chinese: 在一場平靜的葬禮中，施密被安葬在拉爾斯家宅。

sentences.english: And even though I could not obtain a grand funeral, would I be left in the street when I die?
sentences.chinese: 我即使不能隆重安葬，我會死在道路上無人管嗎？

sentences.english: When she poured this perfume on my body, she did it to prepare me for burial.
sentences.chinese: 他將這香膏澆在我身上，是爲我安葬作的。
重新安葬將會傷害到誰？

sentences.english: The famous poet was buried in this cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 那位著名詩人被安葬在這個公墓。

sentences.english: He lived the last years of his life in Switzerland , where he was buried in 1977.
sentences.chinese: 他在瑞士安度晚年，並於1977年被安葬在那裏。

sentences.english: Babe Ruth is buried near New York City.
sentences.chinese: 貝比魯斯被安葬在紐約市附近。

sentences.english: Another saying is that his town fellow, Du Ping buried him after his death.
sentences.chinese: 又說，鍾馗死後，他的同鄉好友杜平爲他安葬。

sentences.english: She was buried beside her husband at Oak Ridge Cemetery in Springfield.
sentences.chinese: 安葬於斯普林菲爾德市橡樹林公墓，林肯的旁邊。

definition: buried and at rest (idiom); Resquiescat in pacem (RIP)
to bury husband and wife together/joint interment
to put dead body in coffin
to keep watch beside a coffin
